question: Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your lettersuggest how you could help her in her homesay why you would like to do this workexplain when you will and will not be available
text: Hope my letter finds you well.

I am writing this letter regarding the advertisement that you published in our local newspaper. I would like to let you know that I am interested to help you with some of your household chores for a few hours per day this coming summer break.

Firstly, I can help you to do your laundry. Cooking is my passion, therefore, there is no problem with that aspect. I can prepare a dinner meal for you. Additionally, I know how to clean the house since I am always in-charge in doing it in our home. Please do let me know if there are some tasks that I forgot to mention, or/and I do not have experience with, I am willing to learn.
I am available Monday to Friday, from 8 to 10 in the morning and the whole day at the weekend. Kindly note that I am an International student, therefore, I have a class to attend in the afternoon.
I appreciated it if you could consider me. Looking forward to hearing from you.
